text: Alan Charles Lancaster (7 February 1949 â€“ 26 September 2021) was an English musician. He was best known as founding member and bassist of the rock band Status Quo. He played with the band from 1967 to 1985. On 26 September 2021, Lancaster died in Sydney, Australia, at the age of 72 from problems caused by multiple sclerosis. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple sclerosis Category:English rock guitarists Category:English rock drummers Category:English rock singers Category:Singer- songwriters from London Category:Musicians from London Category:People from Peckham
title: Alan Lancaster
